item.title: Another warm, humid and stormy day in the forecast
ABC7 talks with Sarasota County Schools Superintendent Terry Connor
item.description: ABC7 talks with Sarasota County Schools Superintendent Terry Connor

item.title: Lightning blamed for boat fire in Englewood
item.description: Lightning blamed for boat fire in Englewood

item.title: Boar’s Head plans to reopen troubled deli meat plant, but reports of sanitation problems persist
item.description: The Boar's Head deli meat plant at the heart of a deadly food poisoning outbreak is set to reopen in the coming months.

item.title: Florida farm identified as source of raw milk that sickened 21
item.description: The Florida Department of Health has identified Keely Farms Dairy as the source of raw milk that has sickened 21 people.

item.title: Accused accessory in Battie murder case withdraws request to lower bond
item.description: Nicole Roberts is accused of helping her boyfriend dispose of the murder weapon.

item.title: Meet Johnny, ABC7’s Pet of the Week
item.description: Johnny is a sweet 11-month-old Cocker Spaniel ready to find his forever home.

item.title: New alert system coming to Bradenton Beach
item.description: Perhaps the most important feature about this new system? They won’t over-notify you.

item.title: Suspect in Nokomis trailer park arson waives bond hearing
item.description: ABC7 spoke to two of the defendant’s friends who said this is out of character for Pendell.

item.title: Body found in pond along I-75 near where missing teen was last seen
item.description: The sheriff's office says a decomposing body was found in a retention pond near I-75 and State Road 70.

item.title: Sarasota kindergarten vaccine rates plummet — and doctors fear speaking out
item.description: More than 1,350 measles cases have been confirmed across 40 states, including Florida, so far this year.

item.title: Excessive rainfall possible this weekend
item.description: High rain chances continue through the weekend, while odds of tropical development are dropping.

item.title: ABC7 First Alert Weather update on new area of interest near Africa
item.description: A tropical wave just off the coast of Africa has a 20% chance of developing over the next 7 days.
